channel.title: New on Jennifer Weir
channel.description: Recent content in New on Jennifer Weir

item.title: Unreasonable Hospitality Part 1
item.description: Book Analysis! I love non-fiction. I love hearing (or reading) people’s stories. I love when a non-fiction piece is a true page turner. Most of all, I love when something read in a book lines up with life in such a way that feels as if the author knew it was meant for you. Partly great book buying by the consumer, partly great book recommending by a friend (or algorithm), or maybe, they’re a very good author capable of targeting a wide audience. All wins!
